text: "Woman" is a 1981 song by John Lennon and is the second single from his 1980 album Double Fantasy. It was the first song following his murder on 8 December, 1980. It topped the charts in the United Kingdom, Canada, Ireland, New Zealand and Zimbabwe. Category:1981 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:John Lennon songs
title: Woman (John Lennon song)
